mapper.select: select rownum, g.tableno, c.tablename, g.gametype, TO_CHAR(g.gamedate, 'MM/DD') AS gamedate, TO_CHAR(g.starttime, 'HH24:MI') AS starttime, TO_CHAR(g.endtime, 'HH24:MI') AS endtime, g.gametime, g.paytype, g.paymoney, g.income from games g, cuetable c where c.tableno=g.tableno and c.tablename=#{tableName} and gamedate > #{minDate} and gamedate < #{maxDate} and payStatus='1'
mapper.update: update games set income=#{income}, payType=#{payType}, paystatus=1 where gameno=#{gameNo}
mapper.select: select row_number()over(order by gameno)num, gameno, tableno, starttime, endtime, paymoney from games where tableno=#{tableNo} and paystatus='0'
select tableno, biliardno, tablename, tabletype, status as tableStatus from cuetable where tableno = #{tableno}
mapper.update: update cuetable set tabletype=#{tableType} where tableNo =#{tableNo}
mapper.select: select g.gameNo, g.tableNo, g.gameType, g.memberNum, g.gameDate, g.gameTime, g.startTime, g.endTime, g.payStatus, g.payType, g.payDate, g.income, g.payMoney, g.pauseStart, g.pauseStop, g.pauseTime, g.setNo from games g, cuetable c where g.tableNo=c.tableNo and c.biliardNo=#{biliardNo} and g.payStatus=0

select g.gameno, g.tableno, g.gametype, g.membernum, g.gamedate, g.gametime, g.starttime, g.endtime, g.paystatus, g.paytype, g.paydate, g.income, g.paymoney, g.pausestart, g.pausestop, g.pausetime, g.setno, c.tableno, c.biliardno, c.tablename, c.tabletype, c.status as tableStatus from cuetable c full join games g on g.tableno=c.tableno where g.gameno = (select Max(gameno) from games where tableno= #{tableNo})
select tableno, biliardno, tablename, tabletype, status as tableStatus from cuetable where biliardno = #{biliardNo} order by tablename
select biliardno, btablefee, mtablefee, ptablefee, bminfee, mminfee, pminfee from tariff where biliardno =#{[biliardNo}
mapper.update: update tariff set btablefee = #{btablefee}, mtablefee = #{mtablefee}, ptablefee = #{ptablefee}, bminfee = #{bminfee}, mminfee = #{mminfee}, pminfee = #{pminfee} where biliardno=#{biliardno}
